# init()

**Initializer**

Initializes a capture screen input that provides media data from the main screen.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

Using this initializer is equivalent to calling [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureScreenInput/init(displayID:)] with the result of the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGMainDisplayID()] function.

## Initializing a capture screen input

- **init(displayID:)**: Initializes a capture screen input that provides media data from the specified display.
